name: IOUserHIDDevice
desc: A provider object for devices that support interactions with users.

items.name: - handleStart
items.desc: Performs any custom initialization associated with starting the device service.

items.name: - Start
items.desc: Starts the device service and associates it with the specified provider object.

items.name: - newDeviceDescription
items.desc: Creates and returns a new dictionary that describes the HID device.

items.name: - newReportDescriptor
items.desc: Returns the data in the HID device's report descriptor.
